{"id":931173478,"question_id":2721,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1681116481,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"40 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/931173478/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sum of Distances","memory":"63.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long[] distance(int[] nums) {\n        int len = nums.length;\n        long[] res = new long[len];\n        \n        \n        HashMap<Integer, List<Integer>> map = new HashMap<>();\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n            map.putIfAbsent(nums[i], new ArrayList<>());\n            map.get(nums[i]).add(i);\n        }\n        \n        for(Map.Entry<Integer, List<Integer>> en : map.entrySet()){\n            \n            int val = en.getKey();\n            List<Integer> list = en.getValue();\n            long sum = 0;\n            for(int i=0; i<list.size(); i++){\n                sum += (long)(list.get(i) - list.get(0));\n            }\n            res[list.get(0)] = sum;\n            \n            \n             // System.out.println(en.getKey() + \" \" + sum);\n            \n            \n            for(int i=1; i<list.size(); i++){\n                sum += (long) (list.get(i)-list.get(i-1))*i;\n                sum -= (long) (list.get(i)-list.get(i-1))*(list.size()-i) ;\n                \n                \n                res[list.get(i)] = sum ;\n            }\n            \n        }\n        \n        \n        \n        \n        return res;\n    }\n}\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sum-of-distances","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
